scripts.version: node ./maintenance-scripts/version-bump.mjs && git add package.json manifest.json public/manifest.json public/versions.json && git commit -m version && git push
scripts.release-patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && bash ./maintenance-scripts/release.sh
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && bash ./maintenance-scripts/release.sh
scripts.release-major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && bash ./maintenance-scripts/release.sh
